title: State v. Terrance Lewis – Episode 2 – The Bootstrap Paradox
itunes:subtitle: December 11, 2017 / Years after Terrance Lewis' conviction for the murder of Bernard Howard in 1996, new witnesses come forward with information that, according to a federal court, proved his actual innocence. So why does Terrance Lewis remain in priso...
content:encoded:
December 11, 2017 / Years after Terrance Lewis' conviction for the murder of Bernard Howard in 1996, new witnesses come forward with information that, according to a federal court, proved his actual innocence. So why does Terrance Lewis remain in prison today?

Image: the photos from array #1, used to identify Terrance Lewis (pic 7)

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon, Blue Dot Sessions.

THANK YOU to Stamps.com for sponsoring this episode!
